flawed_nl_solution:
Since Agate has 30 precious stones and Olivine has 5 more precious stones, then Olivine has 30+5 = <<30+5=53>>53 precious stones.
The total number of stones Olivine and Agate has is 53+30 = <<53+30=83>>83
Diamond has 11 more precious stones than Olivine, who has 53 stones, meaning Diamond has 53+11= <<11+53=64>>64 precious stones
In total, they all have 83+64 = <<83+64=147>>147 precious stones.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
